mapper.sql: AutoID, AppCode,AppKey, AppName, AppExplain, AppType, CompanyCode, AppAddress, AppSize, ImgSmall, ImgBig, if(IsFree=1,'是','否')IsFree, Price, OperaterUserID, if(Status=1,'已审核','未审核') Status, LastReviewDate, UploadUserID, UploadExplain, date_format(CreateDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') CreateDate, date_format(ModifyDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ModifyDate,IsDel
mapper.insert: insert into appinfo (AutoID, AppCode, AppKey, AppName, AppExplain, AppType, CompanyCode, AppAddress, AppSize, ImgSmall, ImgBig, IsFree, Price, OperaterUserID, Status, LastReviewDate, UploadUserID, UploadExplain, CreateDate, ModifyDate, IsDel ) values (#{autoID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appSize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{imgSmall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isFree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{operaterUserID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastReviewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uploadUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uploadExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update appinfo
AppCode = #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AppKey = #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AppName = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AppExplain = #{appExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AppType = #{appType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CompanyCode = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AppAddress = #{appAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AppSize = #{appSize,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ImgSmall = #{imgSmall,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ImgBig = #{imgBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IsFree = #{isFree,jdbcType=INTEGER},

OperaterUserID = #{operaterUserID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

UploadUserID = #{uploadUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER},

CreateDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ModifyDate = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IsDel = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where AutoID = #{autoID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update appinfo set AppCode = #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AppKey = #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AppName = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AppExplain = #{appExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AppType = #{appType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CompanyCode = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AppAddress = #{appAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AppSize = #{appSize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ImgSmall = #{imgSmall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ImgBig = #{imgBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsFree = #{isFree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, OperaterUserID = #{operaterUserID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LastReviewDate = #{lastReviewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UploadUserID = #{uploadUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UploadExplain = #{uploadExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ModifyDate = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsDel = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where AutoID = #{autoID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select from appinfo where IsDel=1
AND AppName like CONCAT('%', #{keywords},'%')
mapper.update: update appinfo set Status = #{status} where AutoID = #{id}
